text: Mary Frances Gifford (December 7, 1920 â€“ January 22, 1994) was an American actress who played the lead character in 1930s and 1940s movies. Some of her movies were Stage Door and The Remarkable Andrew. Gifford was born in Long Beach, California. The actress died of emphysema in Pasadena, California at 73. == Other websites == * Category:American movie actors Category:Actors from Long Beach, California Category:1920 births Category:1994 deaths
title: Frances Gifford
